title: Textual Cueing and Summary Scaffolding Strategies for Optimizing Cognitive Load and Strengthening Mental Models

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic language structures and acquisition of job-related fundamental terminology
context.additional_context: Language Learning Support Program for Entry-Level Professionals in Medical, Legal, and Technical Fields

learning_goals: Learners can identify core concepts of learning content with at least 80% accuracy using textual clues.
Learners can reconstruct complex linguistic structures step-by-step by applying summary scaffolding techniques.
In project-based assessments, learners can present at least three conceptual connections that demonstrate the formation of mental models.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
